results.title: Trump and India's Modi split over U.S. role in Pakistan ceasefire
results.description: In a Tuesday phone call, India's Modi told Trump that the U.S. did not play a role in de-escalating tensions between India and Pakistan. The call was the first time the two leaders had spoken since the early May military conflict between the two countries.
